products.title: Water Bucket Filter Wholesale (Without Adya Clarity)
products.body_html:
Enhance your Potable Water

Experience the ultimate water treatment system with the Water Bucket Filter System, enhanced by the powerful purification properties of Adya Clarity Ionic Minerals. Not only does Adya Clarity purify your water, reducing 250+ contaminants, it also mineralizes and structures your water, enriching it with essential minerals for enhanced hydration. Then, the micro-ceramic filter of the Bucket System takes over, ensuring that your water is impeccably filtered and free of sediment formed by the purification process of Adya Clarity.

Made in the USA, our system features a 3.5-gallon top tank where water, pre-treated with Adya Clarity to reduce a wide range of impurities, is added. It then filters through a micro-ceramic filter, effectively removing any remaining sediment as it moves to the bottom 3.5-gallon bottom tank, providing exceptionally pure and great-tasting water.

The HDPE #2 BPA-free food-grade plastic construction guarantees longevity and maintains the integrity of your water. At a height of 22.5 inches and a width and depth of 12 inches, this system offers considerable capacity without occupying too much space.

Easy to assemble and use, the Water Bucket Filter System does not rely on electricity. It weighs only 4 lb 9 oz, making it easily transportable for on-the-go or in any corner of your home. 

The Water Bucket Filter System, coupled with Adya Clarity, forms an unrivaled duo that delivers pristine water, which is not only free from visible impurities but also from those invisible to the naked eye.

This comprehensive system includes:

  • 1 - Top bucket with lid, where you add Adya Clarity to treat the water initially.
  • 1 - Bottom bucket with lid, to collect and store the purified water after filtration.
  • 1 - Micro-Ceramic Filter, to filter out any remaining sediment post-purification.
  • 1 - Spigot, for convenient access to your clean water.
  • 1 - Adya Clarity 32 oz., the first step in your water treatment process, ensuring the elimination of toxic contaminants for the cleanest water possible.

Choose this system for an unmatched, thorough approach to water treatment, and enjoy the peace of mind that comes with knowing your water is as pure as nature intended.

products.title: Seconds - 4-Layer Earth Replacement Water Filter
products.body_html:
We have some 4-Layer Earth Filters in our warehouse that have some imperfections but are still perfectly functional, so we're selling them at a HUGE discount - 75% off for a limited time, while supplies last! 

"Seconds" are items that do not meet the standard of quality for our regular retail sales. Reasons for a filter being deemed a "second" may include too much mixing of layer components, chipped ceramic or plastic, some broken ceramic balls, or simply having opened plastic packaging. Seconds sales cannot be combined with other discounts. All seconds sales are final. No exchanges, returns, or refunds. 

The 4-Layer Earth Replacement Water Filter fits in the bottom tank of all drinking water filters sold at www.adyawater.com.  It contains four stages of activated carbon, zeolites, silica sand, and ion exchange resin that are highly effective in the removal of bad odors, tastes, and other compounds.

Activated Carbon
Carbon has been used since ancient times (1200 BC) to purify water. Activated carbon is “activated” by heat and oxygen to create a high surface area which absorbs a wide range of contaminants frequently found in water.

Zeolites
Zeolites are micro-porous, aluminosilicate minerals with a unique cage-like structure that makes them useful in many ways, especially in water filters. Their ion exchange and absorption properties reduce odor and clean heavy metals and other natural compounds from water.

Silica Sand
Silica sand is commonly used in water filters because of its highly absorbent qualities to remove granular contaminants, suspended solids, and colloids.

Ion Exchange Resin
In water purification, ion exchange resin removes poisonous and heavy metal ions, replacing them with more harmless ions, such as sodium or potassium.

Features:

  • Long-lasting – Replace once every six months.
  • Provides 500 gallons of clean, great-tasting water.
  • Easy to insert & replace.
  • No maintenance is required.
California & Iowa Customers: Due to certain restrictive water treatment registration laws, all water filters, replacement water filters & parts sold at www.adyawater.com are not available for residents of California or Iowa. Click here for more information.

products.title: Water Filter Replacement Faucet Wholesale
products.body_html: This replacement faucet includes 2 replacement washers and conveniently fits on any drinking water filter sold at www.adyawater.com.

products.title: Easy-Measure Squeeze Bottle 10 oz. - Wholesale
products.body_html:
Measure just the right amount of Adya Clarity® without spillage or loss of product with the Easy-Measure Squeeze Bottle 10 oz. 

To use, simply remove the cap from the measuring section. Gently squeeze the bottle to fill the measuring section with the required amount of solution and easily pour the measured solution into your water container or water filter. Made exclusively in Japan with HDPE #2 BPA-free plastic.

products.title: Micro-Ceramic Replacement Water Filter - Case (12) Wholesale
products.body_html:
The Micro-Ceramic Replacement Water Filter fits in the top tank of all drinking water filters sold at www.adyawater.com. This filter is composed of highly compressed ceramic with an absolute pore size of 0.2 micron in diameter.

Features:

  • Long-lasting – Replace once every 12 months.
  • Provides 1,000 gallons of clean, great-tasting water.
  • Easy to insert, replace & maintain.

Maintenance Guidelines

California & Iowa Customers: Due to certain restrictive water treatment registration laws, all water filters, replacement water filters & parts sold at www.adyawater.com are not available for residents of California or Iowa. Click here for more information.

products.title: Adya Clarity® 32 oz. - Case (12 Bottles) Wholesale
products.body_html:
Adya Clarity's unique formulation of concentrated, naturally occurring ionic mineral salts neutralizes and assists in the reduction of over 250 contaminants. It reduces lead, chlorine (taste & odor), and fluoride to non-detectable levels, up to 99.9% of agricultural and industrial chemicals, 99.5% of pharmaceuticals, and much more. Plus, it contains a broad spectrum of minerals like calcium, phosphorus, potassium, and magnesium which help enhance the flavor of water.

Clean, contaminant-free drinking water is the foundation for good health. Adya Clarity® helps reduce up to 50X's more contaminants than conventional brands while containing natural ionic trace minerals, providing you with cleaner, healthier, better-tasting water.

Features:

  • Neutralizes over 250 contaminants including pharmaceuticals, OTC drugs, agricultural chemicals, heavy metals, industrial chemicals, disinfectants, disinfection byproducts, and microorganisms to a concentration less than or equal to NSF/EPA permissible standards.
  • Improves taste by neutralizing up to 100% of contaminants that affect taste like chlorine; contains trace quantities of natural electrolytes (minerals) like calcium, phosphorus, potassium, and magnesium which help enhance flavor.
  • Aids filtration by neutralizing contaminants that would ordinarily pass through most water filters.
  • Eco-friendly alternative to chlorine and other chemical-based water treatments; will never create harmful byproducts.
  • Easy to use. Simply add the recommended amount of solution to your water prior to filtration.
  • 5+ year shelf life. Great for water storage.
  • U.S. manufactured to comply with GMP standards.
  • Tested according to NSF and EPA standards (when applicable).
  • Purifies up to 250 gallons (950 L) of water.

Use Adya Clarity® to purify water for all of your needs:

  • Drinking – for your family and pets
  • Making beverages – coffee, tea, juice, etc.
  • Washing Foods – fruits, vegetables, etc.
  • Cooking – pasta, soup, etc.
  • Watering Plants – indoor and outdoor

California Customers: Due to certain restrictive water treatment registration laws, Adya Clarity® may only be sold to California residents for outdoor and/or recreational uses. Please only use Adya Clarity® for outdoor/recreational uses if you live in California. Click here for more information.

products.title: Easy-Measure Squeeze Bottle 10 oz.
products.body_html:
Measure just the right amount of Adya Clarity® without spillage or loss of product with the Easy-Measure Squeeze Bottle 10 oz.

To use, simply remove the cap from the measuring section. Gently squeeze the bottle to fill the measuring section with the required amount of solution and easily pour the measured solution into your water container or water filter. Made exclusively in Japan with HDPE #2 BPA-free plastic.

products.title: Adya Water Gift Card
products.body_html:
Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with an Adya Water gift card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

products.title: Adya Clarity® Ionic Minerals, 32 oz.
products.body_html:
Adya Clarity® Water Purifying Minerals - The Ultimate Solution for Pure, Healthy, Living Water

Ensure the health and safety of your family's water with Adya Clarity® Ionic Minerals. Our advanced water purifying solution is specially formulated with naturally occurring ionic trace mineral salts that effectively neutralize and reduce over 250 harmful contaminants, including lead, chlorine, fluoride, chemicals, pesticides, pharmaceuticals, and more. With our product, you can rest easy knowing that your family is drinking the purest water possible.

But that's not all -  Adya Clarity® Ionic Minerals enhances the taste of your water with a broad spectrum of beneficial minerals such as calcium, phosphorus, potassium, and magnesium. 

Features and Benefits

  • Effectively neutralizes and reduces over 250 contaminants, including pharmaceuticals & over-the-counter drugs, chemicals, heavy metals, pesticides, fungicides, herbicides (including glyphosate), insecticides, disinfectants, and disinfection byproducts to a concentration less than or equal to NSF/EPA permissible standards.
  • Independently tested according to NSF and EPA standards (when applicable) for maximum safety and efficacy.
  • Improves the taste of your water by neutralizing contaminants that affect flavor, like chlorine, and adding trace quantities of natural minerals (electrolytes) like calcium, phosphorus, potassium, and magnesium to enhance the flavor.
  • Aids filtration by neutralizing contaminants that would ordinarily pass through most water filters, providing even more protection.
  • Extremely easy to use, simply add the recommended amount of solution to your water prior to filtration for optimal results.
  • Has an unlimited shelf life when stored properly, making it a great choice for water storage.
  • Proudly manufactured in the U.S. to comply with GMP standards for quality assurance.
  • One bottle can purify up to 250 gallons (950 L) of water, making it a long-lasting and cost-effective solution.

Adya Clarity® Ionic Minerals: The All-in-One Water Purifying Solution for Your Family and Home

  • Drinking water - providing your family and pets with safe, pure, and refreshing water.
  • Beverages - Making coffee, tea, and juice taste better by removing impurities from the water.
  • Washing - Cleaning fruits, vegetables, and other foods, making them safer to eat by removing dirt, chemical, and other impurities.
  • Cooking - Enhancing the taste of pasta, soup, and other dishes, providing essential minerals and removing any impurities that can affect the taste.
  • Watering - Improving the quality of the water for indoor and outdoor plants by removing impurities and adding essential minerals to the water, ensuring plants are getting what they need to thrive.
  • Storage - Great for storing water for a long period of time as it has an unlimited shelf life when stored properly.
  • General use - can be used for any other purposes that required purified water.
